snippet: With Peyton Manning’s absence laying bare the holes in the Colts’ roster, the owner, Jim Irsay, fired the team president, Bill Polian, and his son Chris, the general manager.
abstract: Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay cleans house, firing team president Bill Polian and his general manager son Chris Polian; says it is time to make a change on the management side of the team after 2-14 season; St Louis Rams fire coach Steve Spagnuolo and Tampa Bay Buccaneers fire coach Raheem Morris.
lead_paragraph: With Peyton Manning’s absence laying bare the holes in the Colts’ roster, the owner, Jim Irsay, fired the team president, Bill Polian, and his son Chris, the general manager.

headline.seo: Indianapolis Colts Fire Bill and Chris Polian
headline.main: Citing Need for Change After Dismal Season, Colts Part Ways With Polians
headline.print_headline: Citing Need for Change After Dismal Season, Colts Part Ways With Polians
